author: Andrew Rae

text:
I can't even begin to explain the rush of feelings I get when I hear this song. Taking me back to when I was seven years old. This is a testament to how well the guys who worked on this game made something amazing from little. 
P.S. This is an amazing song, no doubt. But even I, hardcore nintendo fan boy who grew up and loved this tune agrees the Metroid Metal Version of this song done by Stemage is even better. If you haven't already, check it out!
author: Lee Garasich

text: one of the best credit themes ever...
author: DatLine

text: So good they made a Brawl mix.
author: David E.

text: Best parts of the song are at 0:22 and my favorite 1:30 ish. Just makes me feel like I accomplished something with those games and reminds me of the shock of finding out Samus is a girl. Thanks for the upload. This is fantastic
author: Dankore

text:
YES!!
YES!!

Ever since I've been subscribed to your channel, for MONTHS now, I've waited for this tune to pop up. This might just be my all-time favorite game ending song, out of all the millions of orchestrated and epic themes I've heard, this one touches my heart like no other. Thank you so much for uploading this.
author: ManfredMitchum

text: Definitely one of the best ending themes ever, I love how the beginning parts of it are timed with the revelation of Samus' true identity.
